Abstract#1: Live recording of Matthew Fox's From Despair to Hope, From Grief to Creativity: A Spiritual Response to September 11th. Given October 4th, 2001, sponsored by Soul Journey 2000. Topics include 911, grief, compassion, community, American culture, spiritual warriors, economics, imperialism, Via Negativa, activism, fundamentalism in religion, and gratitude.
